SEARCH
Package control

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
control.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
Handles project-related logic such as filtering, creation, application, booking, and modification of BTO projects for applicants, officers, and managers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectController()
    Constructs a ProjectController and initializes default filters.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectController

  • Method Details

    • getFlatAvailability

      public List<String> getFlatAvailability(Applicant a)
      Returns a list of flat types available for the given applicant based on their age and marital status.

      The eligibility rules are as follows:

      • If the applicant is 35 or older and single, they are eligible for a 2-Room flat if it is available.
      • If the applicant is 21 or older and married, they are eligible for a 2-Room flat if available, and additionally for a 3-Room flat if the 2-Room is also available.
      Parameters:
      a - the applicant whose eligibility and flat availability is being checked
      Returns:
      a list of flat types the applicant is eligible to apply for

    • filterByLocation

      public void filterByLocation(String location)
      Applies a location filter.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to filter by

    • filterByFlatType

      public void filterByFlatType(String flatType)
      Applies a flat type filter.
      Parameters:
      flatType - the flat type to filter by (e.g. "3-Room")

    • filterByMaxPrice

      public void filterByMaxPrice(int maxPrice)
      Applies a maximum price filter.
      Parameters:
      maxPrice - the maximum flat price allowed

    • filterByMinPrice

      public void filterByMinPrice(int minPrice)
      Applies a minimum price filter.
      Parameters:
      minPrice - the minimum flat price allowed

    • getFilters

      public Map<String,String> getFilters()
      Retrieves the current active filter settings.
      Returns:
      map of filter keys and their values

    • getFilteredProjects

      public List<Project> getFilteredProjects(User user)
      Returns a list of filtered projects based on user role and active filters. Applicants will only see projects they're eligible for. Officers see their assigned projects and all visible ones. Managers see all projects.
      Parameters:
      user - the user requesting the project list
      Returns:
      a list of projects filtered by eligibility and criteria

    • getFilteredProjects

      public List<Project> getFilteredProjects(List<Project> p)
      Returns a list of filtered projects based on an existing list of projects and active filters. This method is useful for refining a pre-filtered set of projects.
      Parameters:
      p - the list of projects to further filter
      Returns:
      a list of projects after applying all filters

    • getAvailableProjects

      public List<Project> getAvailableProjects(User user)
      Returns a list of available projects for the given user based on their role and eligibility. Applicants see projects that match age, marital status, and flat type. Officers see visible projects and those they are assigned to. Managers see all projects.
      Parameters:
      user - the user requesting the list of available projects
      Returns:
      list of projects visible or applicable to the user

    • applyToProject

      public boolean applyToProject(Applicant a, String projectName)
      Allows an applicant to apply to a project based on role eligibility and project name. HDB Officers are restricted from applying to projects they manage. Eligibility is based on age, marital status, and project requirements.
      Parameters:
      a - the applicant attempting to apply
      projectName - the name of the project to apply for
      Returns:
      true if application is accepted, false otherwise

    • bookFlat

      public void bookFlat(HDBOfficer officer, String n, String flatType)
      Books a flat of a specific type for an applicant based on NRIC. Updates application status and flat count.
      Parameters:
      officer - the HDB officer performing the booking
      n - the NRIC of the applicant
      flatType - the flat type to book (e.g., "3-Room")

    • toggleProject

      public void toggleProject(Project p, boolean a)
      Toggles the visibility of a project.
      Parameters:
      p - the project to update
      a - the visibility status to set

    • createProject

      public void createProject(HDBManager m, Project p)
      Creates a new project and adds it to both the manager's created list and the global list.
      Parameters:
      m - the manager creating the project
      p - the project to be created

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(HDBManager m, Project p)
      Deletes a project from both the manager's project list and the system-wide list.
      Parameters:
      m - the manager requesting deletion
      p - the project to delete

    • editProject

      public <T> void editProject(HDBManager manager, Project p, String field, T info)
      Edits a specific field of a project based on field name and value. Supports editing name, location, dates, and officer slot count.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of value to be passed (e.g., String, Date, Integer)
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager editing the project
      p - the project to edit
      field - the field name to edit (e.g., "name", "location")
      info - the new value to assign to the field

    • editFlatTypeAvailable

      public void editFlatTypeAvailable(Project p, Map<String,Integer> k)
      Updates the map of available flat types and their counts for a project.
      Parameters:
      p - the project to update
      k - the map of flat types and availability to set

    • editFlatPrices

      public void editFlatPrices(Project p, Map<String,Integer> k)
      Updates the flat price map for a project.
      Parameters:
      p - the project to update
      k - the map of flat types and prices to set

    • processApplication

      public void processApplication(HDBManager manager, Applicant a, String flatType, String status)
      Processes an application by assigning an application status to the applicant if the requested flat type is still available in the project.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDB manager handling the application
      a - the applicant whose application is being processed
      flatType - the flat type requested by the applicant
      status - the new application status (e.g., "Approved", "Rejected")

    • getRegistrations

      public List<HDBOfficer> getRegistrations(Project p)
      Returns a list of HDB officers registered to a given project.
      Parameters:
      p - the project to query
      Returns:
      a list of assigned HDB officers

    • getApplications

      public List<Applicant> getApplications()
      Returns the list of all applicants stored in memory.
      Returns:
      a list of all applicants

    • processRegistrations

      public void processRegistrations(HDBManager manager, Project p, HDBOfficer officer, String status)
      Processes the registration decision of an officer for a project. Updates the officer's registration status and moves them into the official list.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager approving or denying the request
      p - the project the officer applied to
      officer - the officer whose registration is being processed
      status - the registration status to set ("Approved" or "Denied")

    • processWithdrawal

      public boolean processWithdrawal(HDBManager manager, Applicant a, String status)
      Processes a withdrawal request from an applicant.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager processing the request
      a - the applicant requesting withdrawal
      status - the status to apply ("approved" or "denied")
